content: <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/" xmlns:time="http://a9.com/-/opensearch/extensions/time/1.0/" xmlns:geo="http://a9.com/-/opensearch/extensions/geo/1.0/"> <ShortName>MOB02CRT</ShortName> <Description>Use MODAPS Web Services to search for various MODIS related data products</Description> <Tags>modis modaps laads ladsweb terra aqua</Tags> <Contact>modapsuso@sigmaspace.com</Contact> <Url xmlns:mp="http://modwebsrv.modaps.eosdis.nasa.gov/opensearchextensions/1.0/" type="text/html" template="http://modwebsrv.modaps.eosdis.nasa.gov/axis2/services/MODAPSservices/getOpenSearch?product=MOB02CRT&collection={mp:collection?}&start={time:start}&end={time:end}&bbox={geo:box}&coordsOrTiles={mp:coordsOrTiles?}&dayNightBoth={mp:dayNightBoth?}" /> <LongName>Search For Level 1 and Atmosphere Products</LongName> <Query xmlns:mp="http://modwebsrv.modaps.eosdis.nasa.gov/opensearchextensions/1.0/" role="example" mp:products="MOB02CRT" mp:collection="5" time:start="2009-09-01" time:end="2009-09-02" geo:box="-100,-70,100,70" mp:coordsOrTiles="coords" mp:dayNightBoth="DNB" /> <Developer>MODAPS Web Services Development Team</Developer> <Attribution>nasa.gov</Attribution> <SyndicationRight>open</SyndicationRight> <AdultContent>false</AdultContent> <Language>en-us</Language> <OutputEncoding>UTF-8</OutputEncoding> <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding> </OpenSearchDescription>
